data.name: Shade Doctor
data.address: 4017 Clay Ave Suite 4017A, Haltom City, TX 76117

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"I am completely blown away with the quality and service level from Shade Docs." "The absolute worst company and customer service I’ve ever dealt with."

Highly recommend for anyone looking to upgrade their patio. My wife and I went back and forth for several months on whether we wanted to really invest in our outdoor space. We value our family time outside and Shade Doctor went above and … More

The product quality is great! However install took 2 days!!! It was not the installer’s fault. The measurements they took were not correct so installers had to make frame/track adjustments on site. 1 shade was too wide, which cannot be … More Response from the owner a month ago We’re sorry to hear about this experience, however we are unable to locate your name in our Customer records. It could be that you were listed under a different name so we’d kindly ask that you would email info@shadedocs.

Had our shades installed last week. We had great communication from the beginning with regular updates from our design consultant. The installation was quick and only took 1 day. I took the temperature outside of my patio and it clocked over 100 degrees. Inside the patio was 86 with no air running out there. Worth every penny. More
